item.description: Student Projects If you are interested in a research project or a master thesis fell free to drop me an email. Possible topics of interest are related (but not limited) to: Cyber range and CTFs: e.g. implementation of realistic scenarios in a simulated environment to reproduce attacker's strategies and exploits Threat Intelligence: e.g. analysis of threat intelligence data to determine behaviors and characteristics of cyber-criminals Privacy on the Web: e.
